text: Wherefore Menelaus, taking Andronicus apart, prayed him Or, to get Onias into his hands  to kill Onias. And coming to Onias, and The Greek text of this sentence is probably corrupt.  being persuaded to use treachery, and being received as a friend, Andronicus  gave him his right hand with oaths of fidelity,  and, though he was suspected by him, so  persuaded him to come forth of the sanctuary; and forthwith he Or, imprisoned him Gr. shut him off.  despatched him without regard of justice.
